column1: {{author infobox| image=| name=Minas Tsoulis| born=1973| died=| education=| occupation=| location=Thessaloniki
Minas Tsoulis (Greek: Μηνάς Τσούλης) is the author of two books related to the study of [[Quenya]]. He knows a number of languages
column4: Italian and Latin. His love for languages led him to the study of Quenya and the subsequent writing of a dictionary and a book of grammar. He is a member of the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]] and he has also participated in other linguistic conferences. <ref>Minas Tsoulis
